trans-unit.source: Provides helper methods for operations that match string patterns.
trans-unit.target: 提供符合字串模式之作業的 Helper 方法。

trans-unit.source: The string to insert into the search pattern string.
trans-unit.target: 要插入搜尋模式字串中的字串。

trans-unit.source: The character to use to escape wildcard characters.
trans-unit.target: 用來逸出萬用字元的字元。

trans-unit.source: Creates a search pattern string where the specified text can have other text before and following it.
trans-unit.target: 建立搜尋模式字串，其中指定的文字前後可以有其他文字。

trans-unit.source: A search pattern string that contains the specified string and the '%' character before and after it.
trans-unit.target: 搜尋模式字串，其中包含指定的字串及其前後的 '%' 字元。

trans-unit.source: The string to insert into the search pattern string.
trans-unit.target: 要插入搜尋模式字串中的字串。

trans-unit.source: The character to use to escape wildcard characters.
trans-unit.target: 用來逸出萬用字元的字元。

trans-unit.source: Creates a search pattern string where the specified text can have other text before it but not following it.
trans-unit.target: 建立搜尋模式字串，其中指定的文字之前 (而非之後) 可以有其他文字。

trans-unit.source: A search pattern string that contains the '%' character followed by the specified string.
trans-unit.target: 搜尋模式字串，其中包含 '%' 字元，後面是指定的字串。

trans-unit.source: The string to insert into the search pattern string.
trans-unit.target: 要插入搜尋模式字串中的字串。

trans-unit.source: The character to use to escape wildcard characters.
trans-unit.target: 用來逸出萬用字元的字元。

trans-unit.source: Creates a search pattern string where the specified text can have other text after it but not before it.
trans-unit.target: 建立搜尋模式字串，其中指定的文字之後 (而非之前) 可以有其他文字。

trans-unit.source: A search pattern string that contains the specified string followed by the '%' character.
trans-unit.target: 搜尋模式字串，其中包含指定的字串，後面是 '%' 字元。

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)] <see langword="Like" /> search pattern to translate to a [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] <see langword="LIKE" /> search pattern.
trans-unit.target: 要轉譯為 [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] <see langword="LIKE" /> 搜尋模式的 [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)] <see langword="Like" /> 搜尋模式。

trans-unit.source: The character to use to escape special SQL characters or the escape character itself.
trans-unit.target: 用來逸出特殊 SQL 字元或逸出字元 (Escape Character) 本身的字元。

trans-unit.source: Translates a search pattern for the [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)] <see langword="Like" /> operator to a search pattern for the [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] <see langword="LIKE" /> operator.
trans-unit.target: 將 [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)] <see langword="Like" /> 運算子的搜尋模式轉譯為 [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] <see langword="LIKE" /> 運算子的搜尋模式。

trans-unit.source: A search pattern for the [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] <see langword="LIKE" /> operator that corresponds to the specified [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)] <see langword="Like" /> search pattern.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] <see langword="LIKE" /> 運算子的搜尋模式，此運算子對應至指定的 [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)] <see langword="Like" /> 搜尋模式。
